bibl.title: From Zoëga to the Present Day. The Roman Coins of Alexandria in 200 Years of Research.
Studies in Ancient History and Numismatics Presented to Rudi Thomsen
bibl.author: Christiansen, Erik

bibl.note: A first version of this paper was read at Alexandria University 10th April 1983 and to the Archaeological Society of Alexandria 17th May same year.
Christiansen Erik, From Zoëga to the Present Day. The Roman Coins of Alexandria in 200 Years of Research.
Studies in Ancient History and Numismatics Presented to Rudi Thomsen (Aarhus, 1988) pp. 232-242.
